item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 17, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Claude AI built me a React app to compare maps side by side (35 points | 11 comments)
3. All-in-one embedding model for interleaved text, images, and screenshots (136 points | 16 comments)

5. Sentence Structure for Writers (2017) (17 points | 5 comments)
6. CSS gets a new logo and it uses the color `rebeccapurple` (548 points | 110 comments)
7. Garak, LLM Vulnerability Scanner (20 points | 3 comments)
8. The Bluesky firehose viewed in the style of a Windows XP screensaver (395 points | 96 comments)
9. Show HN: Zyme – An Evolvable Programming Language (37 points | 7 comments)
10. Requiring Single Page Applications for Interactive Web Apps is a Myth (32 points | 13 comments)
11. Cloudflare.com's Robots.txt (59 points | 9 comments)
12. James Gleick's Chaos: The Software (195 points | 22 comments)
13. Memos – An open source Rewinds / Recall (12 points | 1 comment)
14. Show HN: I built a(nother) house optimized for LAN parties (826 points | 284 comments)

19. Two galaxies aligned in a way where their gravity acts as a compound lens (240 points | 80 comments)
20. Recovering from a kidney donation (43 points | 25 comments)

22. James Webb Space Telescope finds evidence for alternate theory of gravity (317 points | 138 comments)
23. Effect of a giant meteorite impact on Paleoarchean environment and life (121 points | 47 comments)
24. How we made a Ruby method 200x faster (40 points | 32 comments)
25. How to setup self hosted wiki for your startup (16 points | 2 comments)
26. DIMM vs. Udimm vs. Rdimm vs. Sodimm vs. Cudimm: What's the Difference? (24 points | 2 comments)
27. Logica – Declarative logic programming language for data (147 points | 52 comments)
28. Xogot – Godot for iPad (118 points | 27 comments)
29. Yggdrasil Network (290 points | 97 comments)
30. I tried every top email marketing tool (205 points | 125 comments)
